pros: 4th Job Mobbing skill Celestial Roar has a large hitbox
Good link skill for burst type skills
Has a grappling skill Grappling Heart, that pulls you up to platforms above you
One of the furthest double jumps Feather Hop
cons: 4th Job bossing skill Trinity leaves you stationary
Relies on Attack Speed (such as inner ability +1 Attack Speed)

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Damage Reduction (Regular Monsters): +(50% when Power Transfer shield is active)

buffInfo.active: , , , , , (Toggle)
buffInfo.summons: (60s cd), (100s cd), (198 - 150s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (90s cd), (90s cd), (120s cd)

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Soul Seeker – Make Up
  • Soul Seeker – Reinforce OR Piercing Soul Seeker
  • Finale Ribbon – Cooldown Cutter
  • Trinity – Extra Strike
  • Trinity – Reinforce OR Piercing Trinity
    • Go for extra %Ignore DEF if you need more (min. 90% IED)

extraContent.title: Soul Battery Recharge
extraContent.content:
Angelic Busters skills do not use any MP and does not have a MP resource. Angelic Buster instead has a special resource called Soul Battery that some skills require you to charge to use. Your Soul Battery can be recharged by attacking enemies

As you level up and gain new skills, you upgrade a skill called Affinity Heart. As you upgrade this skill, the chance for your battery to recharge will be higher until eventually you won't need to worry about it at all

primary.name: Soul Buster
primary.shortDesc: Hold down attack key to attack continuously. Works while moving. Deal 60% damage to 3 enemies. 20% recharge success chance.
primary.desc: Holding your Attack Key will fire homing bullets
details: Can move while attacking

primary.name: True Heart Inheritance
primary.shortDesc: Additional Soul Shooter Mastery: +10%

primary.name: Grappling Heart
primary.shortDesc: Use to move to nearest the platform above you. Press jump while moving to cancel.
details: Pressing the Jump Key while launching up will cancel the grapple early

primary.name: Day Dreamer
primary.shortDesc: Return to Angelic Buster's room when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Once teleported, exiting the map will move you to Pantheon

primary.name: Dress-up
primary.shortDesc: Use this skill to alter pre-transformation and post-transformation appearances.
primary.desc: Switches between your normal form and transformed form
details: Using attacks will automatically transform you

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Star Bubble
primary.shortDesc: Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 1. Soul Battery Skill. Recharge Chance: 70%

primary.name: Feather Hop
primary.shortDesc: Jump distance will increase with level. Press Jump + directional key in air to jump again.
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Melody Cross
primary.shortDesc: Weapon attack speed +1 for 180 sec.\n[Passive Effect : Max HP +2500]
details: [Passive]: Grants flat Max HP

primary.name: Affinity Heart I
primary.shortDesc: Recharge Rate: +30%, Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Speed Limit: +25

primary.name: Lovely Sting
primary.shortDesc: Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 1. You can detonate the debuff on enemies afterwards. Soul Battery skill. Recharge Chance: 50%
primary.desc: Fires a piercing beam that inflicts a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Pressing this skill again detonates the debuff and damages the enemy

primary.name: Pink Pummel
primary.shortDesc: Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 1. Recharge Chance: 20%
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Power Transfer
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 180. Convert 1% of damage dealt into a protective shield that decreases Damage by 50%.\nCreates a protective shield with a value of 1000 upon casting. The max value of the shield is equal to your Max HP, but it cannot exceed 99999.

primary.name: Soul Shooter Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20

primary.name: Beautiful Soul
primary.shortDesc: Permanent +40 DEX

primary.name: Affinity Heart II
primary.shortDesc: Every 10 enemies KO'd gives you a 100% chance to recharge. Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%.

primary.name: Soul Seeker
primary.shortDesc: Summons 2 spirits to randomly attack 2 mobs in range. Each spirit will deal 320% damage 1 times. 85% chance to recreate spirit and attacks up to 7 time(s). Soul Battery skill. Recharge Chance: 30%
primary.desc: Throws out orbs that seek out and attack nearby enemies
details: After hitting an enemy, there is a chance to create another Soul Seeker at its location
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shining Star Burst
primary.shortDesc: Mobs Hit: 8, Damage: 780%, Number of Attacks: 1. Damage dealt against enemies launched by Heavenly Crash doubled. Soul Battery skill. Recharge Chance: 40%
primary.desc: Blades strike down from above onto enemies in front of you
details: Enemies launched by Heavenly Crash will take extra damage

primary.name: Heavenly Crash
primary.shortDesc: Mobs Hit: 8, Damage: 760%, Number of Attacks: 1. Attacked mobs lifted upwards. Recharge Chance: 20%
primary.desc: Smashes a hammer creating a shockwave that launches enemies into the air

primary.name: Iron Blossom
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 180 sec, Knockback Resistance: +40%. Effect doubled when Power Transfer Shield is up.

primary.name: Dragon Whistle
primary.shortDesc: Attack +40

primary.name: Affinity Heart III
primary.shortDesc: +100% Recharge chance when Recharge fails twice in a row. Dex: +40, Damage: +20%

primary.name: Celestial Roar
primary.shortDesc: Mobs Hit: 8, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 4, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 3 sec. Soul Battery skill. Recharge Chance: 40%
primary.desc: Creates a shockwave in front of you that has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Trinity
primary.shortDesc: Mobs Hit: 1, Damage: 720%, Number of Hits: 2. This skill can be cast up to 3 times in a row. 2nd Attack: 3 hits. 3rd Attack: 4 hits.\n+10% Trinity and Trinity Fusion increase Damage and DEF Ignore on a successful hit with Trinity. Stacks up to 3 times. Soul Battery skill. Recharge Chance: 50%.\n[Passive Effect] Final Damage: +10%, Enemy DEF Ignore: +15%
primary.desc: Unleashes a powerful attack against one enemy
details: Can be used consecutively up to 3 times
Upon hitting an enemy with this skill, you gain a stacking % Trinity Damage and %Ignore DEF buff (up to 3 stacks)
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Finale Ribbon
primary.shortDesc: Mobs Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 10. Creates debuff that has Duration: 20 sec, Angelic Buster's Final Damage: +25%, Party Members with All Other Jobs' Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 40 sec, Recharge Chance: 50%
primary.desc: Swings ribbons that create a gigantic attack while debuffing enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Angelic Buster and increased %Damage for your party members

primary.name: Soul Resonance
primary.shortDesc: Hold the key for this skill. Mobs Hit: 10, Damage Dealt Per Attack: 730%, Duration: 8 sec max, Max Finishing Blow Based on Remaining Duration: 3000%, Damage Against Bosses: +50%\nWhile in use, damage taken, including attacks with damage proportional to Max HP, -35%.\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Create a vortex that damages enemies within it
details: At the end of the duration, unleash a massive explosion
Deals increased damage to bosses
You take reduced damage while casting (including %Max HP attacks)

primary.name: Star Gazer
primary.shortDesc: Critical Damage: +45%, Duration: 180 sec

primary.name: Soul Shooter Expert
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Affinity Heart IV
primary.shortDesc: 100% chance to reattempt Recharge again when it fails. 50% chance to increase damage by 30% for 5 seconds when Recharge is successful.

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Soul Seeker Expert
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to summon a Soul Seeker when attacking with an Angelic Buster skill (excludes Soul Buster and Soul Seeker skills). When using Celestial Roar, activation rate +15%.\nThe summoned Soul Seeker's Attack Power will be only 75% of a regular Soul Seeker.
primary.desc: When toggled, whenever you attack, there is a chance to create
details: has an increased chance to create
Deals reduced damage compared to

hyperActive.name: Pretty Exaltation
hyperActive.shortDesc: Duration: 30 sec, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%, Damage upon attacking Boss Monster: 20%, Chance to trigger Soul Seeker Expert: +15%\nCooldown: 120 sec.

hyperActive.name: Supreme Supernova
hyperActive.shortDesc: Duration: 12 sec, Mobs Hit: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a giant supernova that damages enemies within it
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Final Contract
hyperActive.shortDesc: Duration: 30 sec, Attack Power: 50, Critical Rate: 30%. Knockback Resistance: +100%, Status Resistance: +100%, Elemental Resistance +100%\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Sparkle Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: Summons an orb that grants 6 sec of invincibility, the orb can last up to 30 sec and explodes used again, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 12.\nAll attack skills except Soul Buster further enhance orb invincibility duration and powers, up to 2 stages, with each stage increasing the Final Damage by 100%, and the invincibility duration by 2 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an orb that grants brief invincibility when activated. At the end of the duration or when the Skill Key is pressed again, the orb will explode damaging nearby enemies
details: All attacks except will charge the orb, increasing its %Final Damage and the invincibility duration (up to 2 stages)

fifthMain.name: Superstar Spotlight
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Installs 3 spotlights that shine on you for 30 sec. Each spotlight deals 800% damage 3 times to up to 15 enemies within its area.
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +25, Critical Rate +15%, Knockback Resistance +20%, and Final Damage +5%.
You receive a separate bonus for each spotlight, up to 3 buffs.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: 3 Spotlights appear on the screen, shining light at your location. The spotlights will deal damage to enemies inside it and provides a stacking buff if you are in it
details: Enemies can take damage from multiple spotlights

If you are within the spotlight, you gain %Crit Rate, %Knockback Resistance, %Final Damage and Abnormal Status Resistance
  • Each spotlight will grant the buff (stacking up to 3 times)

fifthMain.name: Mighty Mascot
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Duration: 35 sec. When successfully recharged, uses Twinkle Star or Magical Balloon. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 5. Not used if in the middle of another action.
Acquire 1 Magical Bubble if Twinkle Star or Magical Balloon land successfully, and up to 8 can be held at a time.
Use the skill once more to cast Shiny Bubble Breath. Duration: 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8.
All Magical Bubbles will be consumed upon use of Shiny Bubble Breath. Duration is increased by 0.4 sec for every bubble. Can be used once while summoned. Skill ends only after all Bubbles are used up, even if the summon duration ends beforehand.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When summoned, whenever your battery recharges, Mighty Mascot will attack
details: The attacks will generate a resource called 'Magical Bubbles' if they land (up to 8 at a time)

Pressing the Skill Key again will consume all Magical Bubbles to create a breath attack
  • The duration of the attack is increased for each Magical Bubble consumed
  • The attack only ends after all the Magical Bubbles are consumed and will keep going even if the summon expires
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Trinity Fusion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
A dragon's enemy attacks 7 enemies, for 355% damage, 3 times. 9 attack(s) will occur in total.
While casting this skill, any attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of Max HP will sure a 17% damage penalty.
Cooldown: 14 sec
[Passive Effect: DEX +35]
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a powerful blast attack in front of you
details: Can be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and together
While Trinity Fusion is casting, you gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks
[Passive]: Grants flat DEX

meta: Angelic Buster is DEX pirate class part of the Nova class group. Angelic Busters skills do not use any MP and does not have a MP resource. Instead, the class has a special resource called Soul Battery that some skills require you to charge to use. Your Soul Battery can be recharged by attacking enemies
